Aturan Safeguard Tekstil Ditargetkan Terbit Pekan Depan
02 Nov 2019, 08:37 by Caesar Akbar, Rr. Ariyani Yakti Widyastuti
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Direktur Jenderal Bea Cukai Kementerian Keuangan Heru Pambudi mengatakan aturan Bea Masuk Tidakan Perlindungan Sementara alias safeguard impor tekstil dan produk tekstil tinggal menyelesaikan perkara administrasi sebelum diterbitkan. Ia menargetkan aturan itu terbit pekan depan.
"Administrasi saja, tapi policy sudah oke," ujar Heru di Kantor Kementerian Keuangan, Sabtu, 2 November 2019. Ia mengatakan penyelesaian itu akan dilakukan oleh beberapa unit dan membutuhkan waktu satu hingga dua hari ke depan.
Heru akan memastikan kembali persoalan apa lagi yang membuat aturan safeguard tekstil dan produk tekstil itu tak kunjung rampung. "Ya makanya ini aku cek. Tapi intinya pemerintah udah, tinggal masalah administrasi," tutur dia.
Sebelumnya, Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani Indrawati memastikan aturan pemberlakuan Bea Masuk Tindakan Pengamanan Sementara alias Safeguard untuk impor dan produk tekstil akan segera diberlakukan.
"PMK (peraturan menteri keuangan) sedang diproses," kata Sri Mulyani saat ditemui usai menghadiri rapat terbatas di Kantor Presiden, di Komplek Istana Kepresidenan, Jakarta Pusat, Kamis, 31 Oktober 2019.
Sri Mulyani juga memastikan seluruh unsur usulan dari sejumlah pemangku kepentingan terkait telah memenuhi keinginan bendahara negara, dan hanya tinggal menunggu proses administrasi. Ia pun menegaskan akan segera menandatangani PMK tersebut.
"Kayaknya semua unsur sudah memenuhi saya lagi cek di mana posisinya. Kalau sudah selesai hari ini di meja saya ya saya tanda tangani," kata Sri Mulyani.
Kepala Badan Pengkajian dan Pengembangan Perdagangan Kasan, mengatakan aturan ini memang tinggal menunggu restu Sri Mulyani. Saat ini, proses keluarnya aturan safeguard itu sudah selesai di Komite Pengamanan Perdagangan Indonesia dan telah disetujui Menteri Perdagangan.
Hingga kini, pemerintah memang terus mematangkan rencana pengenaan tarif bea masuk tambahan untuk 121 pos tarif impor tekstil dan produk tekstil atau TPT. Kepala Bidang Kepabeanan dan Cukai Badan Kebijakan Fiskal Kementerian Keuangan Nasruddin Djoko Surjono mengatakan, dalam pembahasan dengan para pelaku industri TPT baik hulu maupun hilir, pengenaan BMTPS akan dikenakan kepada 121 pos tarif produk TPT. Produk ini mencakup benang, kain, tirai maupun produk jadi TPT lainnya.

EGI ADYATAMA

Textile Safeguard Rules Are Targeted To Publish Next Week
02 Nov 2019, 08:37 by Caesar Akbar, Rr. Ariyani Yakti Widyastuti
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - The Director General of Customs and Excise of the Ministry of Finance Heru Pambudi said that the temporary protection measures for importing textiles and textile products need to settle administrative matters before they are issued. He targets the regulation to be issued next week.
"It's just administration, but the policy is okay," Heru said at the Ministry of Finance Office, Saturday, November 2, 2019. He said the settlement would be carried out by several units and would take one to two days to come.
Heru will reaffirm what other issues have made the safeguard rules for textiles and textile products unfinished. "Yes, that's why I checked it. But basically the government has just had administrative problems," he said.
Previously, Minister of Finance Sri Mulyani Indrawati ensured that the rules for the enactment of Temporary Safeguard Safeguards Import Duty for imports and textile products would be immediately enforced.
"The PMK (regulation of the finance minister) is being processed," Sri Mulyani said when met after attending a limited meeting at the Presidential Office, at the Presidential Palace Complex, Central Jakarta, Thursday, 31 October 2019.
Sri Mulyani also ensured that all elements of the proposal from a number of relevant stakeholders had fulfilled the wishes of the state treasurer, and were only waiting for the administrative process. He also stressed that he would immediately sign the PMK.
"I think all the elements have fulfilled me and check where they are. When I finished today at my desk, I will sign it," Sri Mulyani said.
The head of the Kasan Trade Study and Development Agency said that the regulation was just waiting for Sri Mulyani's blessing. At present, the safeguard regulation issuance process has been completed at the Indonesian Trade Security Committee and has been approved by the Minister of Trade.
Until now, the government has indeed continued to finalize plans to impose additional import tariffs for 121 tariffs on the import of textiles and textile products or TPT. Head of Customs and Excise Division of the Ministry of Finance's Fiscal Policy Agency Nasruddin Djoko Surjono said, in discussions with TPT industry players both upstream and downstream, the imposition of BMTPS would be subject to 121 tariff points for TPT products. This product includes yarn, fabric, curtains and other TPT finished products.

EGI ADYATAMA
